Question: Smartgolf CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Smartgolf

Smartgolf CES 2024

- Introducing the latest Smartgolf CES 2024, a cutting-edge golf training and simulation system
- Features advanced swing analysis and feedback for improving golf skills
- Incorporates virtual reality technology for immersive golf course experiences
- Offers real-time data tracking and performance metrics for personalized training
- Portable and easy to set up, making it suitable for home or professional use
